statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialForecasting WHERE id = 1;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM FinancialForecasting WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT id, date, stock_symbol, closing_price FROM FinancialForecasting WHERE closing_price < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM FinancialForecasting WHERE volume BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, volume FROM FinancialForecasting WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND closing_price > 150.00;
SELECT * FROM FinancialForecasting WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, date, closing_price FROM FinancialForecasting WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY closing_price DESC
SELECT AVG(closing_price) AS average_price, MIN(closing_price) AS min_price, MAX(closing_price) AS max_price FROM FinancialForecasting WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT date, MAX(closing_price) AS max_closing_price FROM FinancialForecasting GROUP BY date HAVING MAX(closing_price) > 500
SELECT stock_symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM FinancialForecasting GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 50 ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT date, market_price FROM historical_data WHERE trading_volume > 10000;
SELECT MAX(market_price) AS highest_market_price FROM historical_data;
SELECT AVG(trading_volume) AS average_trading_volume FROM historical_data;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT market_price, trading_volume FROM historical_data WHERE market_price > 100 ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT date, market_price, trading_volume FROM historical_data WHERE trading_volume BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, market_price FROM historical_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-05-31' ORDER BY date;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name FROM market_trends WHERE trend_name LIKE 'Bull%' ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_data;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM historical_stock_data ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price, date FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_value, forecast_date FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_date = '2022-04-15';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_price > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price, date FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_name LIKE 'AAPL%' ORDER BY stock_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_name, AVG(stock_price) AS avg_price FROM historical_stock_data GROUP BY stock_name HAVING avg_price > 500 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT h.stock_id, h.stock_name, f.forecast_value, f.forecast_date FROM historical_stock_data h INNER JOIN forecast_data f ON h.stock_id = f.stock_id ORDER BY f.forecast_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT m.trend_name, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM market_trends m GROUP BY m.trend_name ORDER BY trend_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_data
SELECT date, closing_price, market_index FROM historical_data WHERE market_index = 'NASDAQ'
SELECT * FROM forecasts ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT predicted_price, confidence_level FROM forecasts WHERE confidence_level > 0.8
SELECT trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, market_index, closing_price FROM historical_data WHERE market_index = 'NASDAQ' AND closing_price > 100 ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
SELECT id, trend_date, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT metric_date, metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%revenue%' OR metric_name LIKE '%profit%' ORDER BY metric_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, predicted_price, confidence_level FROM forecasts WHERE predicted_price < 50 AND confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price FROM historical_data WHERE market_index='S&P 500' AND close_price > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT trend_type, prediction, confidence_level FROM market_trends WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction DESC;
SELECT date, analyst_name, report_text FROM analyst_reports WHERE analyst_name='John Doe' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_cap FROM market_data ORDER BY market_cap DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC, close_price ASC
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(close_price) AS avg_price FROM historical_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(close_price) > 100 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT market_index, stock_symbol, MAX(close_price) AS max_price FROM historical_data GROUP BY market_index, stock_symbol ORDER BY max_price DESC
SELECT date, trend_type, prediction, confidence_level FROM market_trends WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM financial_forecasting JOIN historical_data ON financial_forecasting.stock_symbol = historical_data.stock_symbol WHERE predicted_price > actual_price ORDER BY date ASC
